name: omni_brain
description: Centralni procesor Omni Platforme, povezan z OpenAI GPT-5.

system_prompts.init_message: Omni Brain initialized and ready. Connected to OpenAI GPT-5.
system_prompts.error_message: OpenAI connection error. Check API key or endpoint.

functions.handleOpenAIRequest: async function handleOpenAIRequest(req, res) { const { prompt } = req.body; const response = await fetch('https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': `Bearer ${process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY || 'sk-VAŠ_KLJUČ_TUKAJ'}` }, body: JSON.stringify({ model: 'gpt-5', messages: [{ role: 'user', content: prompt }] }) }); const data = await response.json(); res.json({ reply: data.choices[0].message.content }); }
functions.handleChatRequest: async function handleChatRequest(req, res) { const { message } = req.body; const response = await fetch('https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': `Bearer ${process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY || 'sk-VAŠ_KLJUČ_TUKAJ'}` }, body: JSON.stringify({ model: 'gpt-5', messages: [{ role: 'user', content: message }] }) }); const data = await response.json(); res.json({ reply: data.choices[0].message.content }); }
